rukus.text: Tiandi wanwu, dou shi an la de. Nimen de xinshi, wulun jiayi biaobai, huo jiayi yinhui, an la dou yao yi ta er qingsuan nimen. Ranhou, yao she you shei, jiu she you shei; yao chengfa shei, jiu chengfa shei. An la duiyu wanshi shi quanneng de

Shizhe quexin cong ta de zhu jiang shi gei ta de jingdian, xinshimen ye quexin na bu jingdian, tamen ren ren dou quexin an la he ta de zhong tianshi, yiqie jingdian he zhong shizhe.(Tamen shuo):“Women duiyu ta de renhe shizhe, dou bu jiayi qishi.” Tamen shuo:“Women tingcongle, women kenqiu ni she you; women de zhu a! Ni shi zuihou de guisu.”

An la zhi yi ge ren de nengli er jiayi zecheng. Ge ren yao xiangshou ziji suo xingshan gong de jiangshang, yao zaoyu ziji suozuo zui'e de chengfa.“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni buyao chengfa women, ruguo women yiwang huo cuowu. Qiu ni buyao shi women he fu zhongdan, youru ni shi guren he fu ta yiyang. Women de zhu a! Qiu ni buyao shi women danfu women suo buneng sheng ren de. Qiu ni shu rao women, qiu ni she you women, qiu ni lianmin women. Ni shi women de baoyou zhe. Qiu ni yuanzhu women, yi duikang buxindao de minzhong.”
